warnings.message: Potentially placeholder value detected in OPENROUTER_API_KEY
warnings.guidance: The value for OPENROUTER_API_KEY appears to be a placeholder. Make sure to replace it with your actual API key or credential.
warnings.fix_command: # Update OPENROUTER_API_KEY in config/.env with your real credential

warnings.message: All model tiers use the same model - no cost optimization
warnings.guidance: Using the same model for all tiers (premium/budget/fallback) doesn't provide cost optimization. Consider using a cheaper model for budget tasks and a more capable model for premium tasks.
Using a non-DeepSeek model with DeepSeek provider may cause issues. Either change the provider to match your model or use a DeepSeek model.

warnings.message: Required command 'yt-dlp' not found in PATH
warnings.guidance: The yt-dlp command is required for audio/video processing. Install it using your system package manager.
warnings.fix_command: # Install yt-dlp using your package manager (brew/apt install yt-dlp)

warnings.guidance: Setting a log level helps with debugging. Recommended values: INFO for normal use, DEBUG for troubleshooting.
Setting a processing timeout prevents stuck operations. Recommended: 30-60 minutes for most use cases.
Setting retry limits prevents infinite retry loops. Recommended: 3-5 retries.
